awards.text: Nominated for 3 Primetime Emmys. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.

fullplot: Chilling story of the investigation and trial of Charles Manson, leader of a strange cult which under his direction and 'control' committed numerous murders.
plot: The investigation and trial of the horrific Tate-LaBianca mass murders orchestrated by the psychotic pseudo-hippie cult leader, Charles Manson.
title: Helter Skelter
writers: Vincent Bugliosi (based on the book by)
Curt Gentry (based on the book by)
